data.name: TimelineIntroDescription
data.value: From the first contact to the final certificate, we guide you through five consecutive steps and ensure your team feels confident at every stage.

data.name: Step1Summary
data.value: Together we assess the current situation and set project objectives.

data.name: Step1Description
data.value: During the initial consultation we clarify the project scope, legislative and standard requirements, and leadership expectations. The outcome is a clear strategy and cooperation plan.

data.name: Step1Point1
data.value: Analysis of the organisation's current state (gap analysis)

data.name: Step1Point2
data.value: Identification of standard and legislative requirements

data.name: Step1Point3
data.value: Selection of a suitable certification body

data.name: Step2Summary
data.value: We select targeted courses for management, auditors, and operations.

data.name: Step2Description
data.value: Based on the agreed strategy we choose a tailored mix of courses. We connect theoretical requirements with practical examples so every team member knows exactly what to do.

data.name: Step2Point1
data.value: Introductory training on standard requirements for all employees

data.name: Step2Point2
data.value: Specialised courses for the quality manager

data.name: Step2Point5
data.value: Working materials, checklists, and document templates

data.name: Step3Summary
data.value: We set up processes, documentation, and people engagement for the changes.

data.name: Step3Description
data.value: After the training we jointly establish the necessary processes, documentation structure, and change communication. We involve employees and define metrics for long-term improvement.

data.name: Step4Summary
data.value: We verify the organisation's readiness and simulate audit situations.

data.name: Step4Description
data.value: Before the official audit we carry out a complete internal review and model situations to prepare the team for real questions from the certification body.

data.name: Step4Point1
data.value: Carrying out a full internal audit

data.name: Step4Point5
data.value: Action plan to resolve identified nonconformities

data.name: Step5Title
data.value: Certification audit and obtaining the certificate

data.name: Step5Summary
data.value: We accompany you during the certification audit and set up ongoing support.

data.name: Step5Description
data.value: Together we handle the certification audit, help resolve any nonconformities, and set a surveillance audit plan to keep the certification long term.

data.name: Step5Point5
data.value: Plan for surveillance audits and refresher training
